faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about {brand}
faqPage.noResults: No FAQs found matching your search.

whatIs.question: What is PDFCraft?
whatIs.answer: PDFCraft is a free, privacy-focused PDF toolkit that runs entirely in your browser. It offers 80+ professional tools for editing, converting, merging, splitting, and securing PDF files without uploading them to any server.

isFree.question: Is PDFCraft really free?
isFree.answer: Yes, PDFCraft is completely free to use. There are no hidden costs, no premium tiers, and no registration required. All features are available to everyone.

account.question: Do I need to create an account?
account.answer: No, you don't need to create an account or register to use PDFCraft. Simply visit the website and start using any tool immediately.

uploaded.question: Are my files uploaded to a server?
uploaded.answer: No, your files are never uploaded to any server. All PDF processing happens locally in your browser using JavaScript and WebAssembly. Your files never leave your device.

safe.question: Is it safe to use PDFCraft with sensitive documents?
safe.answer: Yes, PDFCraft is designed with privacy in mind. Since all processing happens locally in your browser, your sensitive documents remain on your device and are never transmitted over the internet.

storage.question: What happens to my files after processing?
storage.answer: Your files are stored temporarily in your browser's memory during processing. Once you close the browser tab or navigate away, all file data is automatically cleared. We don't store any of your files.

operations.question: What PDF operations can I perform?
operations.answer: PDFCraft offers 67+ tools including: merge, split, compress, convert (to/from images, text, JSON), edit, annotate, sign, add watermarks, encrypt/decrypt, OCR, and many more.

merge.question: Can I merge multiple PDF files?
merge.answer: Yes, you can merge multiple PDF files into one. Simply use the Merge PDF tool, upload your files, arrange them in the desired order, and click merge.

images.question: Can I convert images to PDF?
images.answer: Yes, PDFCraft supports converting various image formats (JPG, PNG, WebP, BMP, TIFF, SVG, HEIC) to PDF. You can convert single or multiple images at once.

edit.question: Can I edit text in a PDF?
edit.answer: PDFCraft provides annotation and editing tools including highlighting, adding text, shapes, images, and signatures. For full text editing, the PDF Editor tool offers comprehensive annotation capabilities.

browsers.question: What browsers are supported?
browsers.answer: PDFCraft works on all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend using the latest version of your browser for the best experience.

sizeLimit.question: Is there a file size limit?
sizeLimit.answer: Most tools support files up to 100MB, with some tools like merge and compress supporting up to 500MB. These limits are in place to ensure smooth performance in your browser.

slow.question: Why is processing slow for large files?
slow.answer: Since all processing happens in your browser, performance depends on your device's capabilities. Large files require more memory and processing power. For best results, close other browser tabs and applications.

offline.question: Does PDFCraft work offline?
offline.answer: Currently, PDFCraft requires an internet connection to load the application. However, once loaded, the PDF processing itself happens locally and doesn't require a connection.

supported.question: What languages are supported?
supported.answer: PDFCraft is available in 9 languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Portuguese, and Arabic (with RTL support).

change.question: How do I change the language?
change.answer: You can change the language using the language selector in the header. Your preference will be saved for future visits.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Feel free to reach out to us.

aboutPage.title: About {brand}
aboutPage.description: {brand} is a free, privacy-focused PDF toolkit that runs entirely in your browser. With {count}+ professional tools, you can edit, convert, merge, split, and secure your PDF files without ever uploading them to a server.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: We believe that everyone should have access to powerful PDF tools without compromising their privacy or paying expensive subscription fees. That's why we created {brand} â€“ a comprehensive PDF toolkit that puts your privacy first.
mission.p2: Unlike traditional PDF services that require you to upload your files to remote servers, {brand} processes everything locally in your browser. Your sensitive documents never leave your device, giving you complete control over your data.
mission.p3: Whether you're a student, professional, or casual user, {brand} provides all the tools you need to work with PDFs efficiently and securely.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your files never leave your device. All processing happens locally in your browser, ensuring complete privacy and security.

fast.title: Fast & Efficient
fast.description: Powered by modern web technologies, PDFCraft delivers lightning-fast PDF processing without the need for uploads or downloads.

accessible.title: Accessible Everywhere
accessible.description: Available in 9 languages and works on any device with a modern browser. No installation required.

free.title: Free Forever
free.description: PDFCraft is completely free to use with no hidden costs, no registration required, and no limits on usage.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Built with transparency in mind. Our code is open source, allowing anyone to verify our privacy claims.

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: Developed with feedback from users around the world. We continuously improve based on your needs.

technology.title: Built with Modern Technology
technology.description: {brand} is built using cutting-edge web technologies to ensure the best possible experience:

list.indexeddb: <strong1>IndexedDB</strong1> - For secure local storage of your work

technology.summary: This combination of technologies allows us to provide professional-grade PDF tools that run entirely in your browser, without any server-side processing.

linearizePdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop PDF files here, or click to browse. You can select multiple files.
linearizePdf.info: Linearization optimizes PDFs for fast web viewing. The first page will display before the entire file is downloaded, improving user experience for web-hosted documents.
linearizePdf.useObjectStreams: Use object streams for better compression
linearizePdf.useObjectStreamsDesc: Recommended for smaller file sizes. Disable for maximum compatibility with older PDF readers.

pageDimensions.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to browse.
pageDimensions.showingFirst50: Showing first 50 pages. Download JSON for complete data.

removeRestrictions.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a restricted PDF file.
removeRestrictions.ownerPasswordHint: If the PDF has an owner password, enter it here for better results.
removeRestrictions.info: This tool removes owner password restrictions that prevent printing, copying, and editing. It works on PDFs with permission restrictions but cannot remove user passwords required to open the document.
removeRestrictions.warning: Only use this tool on PDFs you own or have permission to modify. Removing restrictions from copyrighted material without authorization may violate copyright laws.
removeRestrictions.successHint: The PDF can now be printed, copied, and edited without restrictions.
removeRestrictions.invalidPassword: The password you entered is incorrect. Please check and try again.

sanitizePdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file to sanitize.
sanitizePdf.info: Sanitization removes potentially harmful content from PDFs, making them safer to open and share.

flattenPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file to flatten.

removeMetadata.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to browse.
removeMetadata.info: Removing metadata helps protect your privacy by stripping identifying information from the PDF.
removeMetadata.title: Title
removeMetadata.author: Author
removeMetadata.subject: Subject
removeMetadata.creator: Creator

changePermissions.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to browse.
changePermissions.privacyNotice: ðŸ”’ Your passwords are processed locally and never sent to any server.
changePermissions.currentPasswordHint: Required if the PDF is already password-protected.
changePermissions.newUserPasswordHint: Users will need this password to open the PDF.
changePermissions.info: Note: Permission enforcement requires PDF encryption. Set an owner password below to enforce restrictions.
changePermissions.allowHighQualityPrintingDesc: Users can print at high resolution
changePermissions.allowCopyingDesc: Users can copy text and images
changePermissions.allowAnnotatingDesc: Users can add comments and annotations
changePermissions.allowFillingFormsDesc: Users can fill in form fields
changePermissions.allowAssemblyDesc: Users can insert, delete, or rotate pages
changePermissions.successHint: For full permission enforcement, encrypt the PDF with an owner password.
changePermissions.invalidPassword: The current password you entered is incorrect. Please check and try again.
changePermissions.passwordRequired: This PDF is password-protected. Please enter the current password to proceed.

fixPageSize.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to browse.
fixPageSize.scaleFitDesc: Scale content to fit within page, maintaining aspect ratio
fixPageSize.scaleFillDesc: Scale content to fill page, may crop edges
fixPageSize.scaleStretchDesc: Stretch content to fill page exactly

bookmark.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file to edit bookmarks.
bookmark.noBookmarks: No bookmarks yet. Click 'Add Bookmark' to create one.
bookmark.hint: Click a bookmark to preview its page. Use +/âœŽ/Ã— to add child, edit, or delete.

pageNumbers.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.
pageNumbers.differentModeHint: This mode is useful for double-sided printing where you want page numbers on the outer edge of each page.

watermark.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.
watermark.enterText: Please enter text for the watermark.
watermark.selectImage: Please select an image file for the watermark.
watermark.unsupportedImage: Unsupported image format. Please use PNG or JPG.

headerFooter.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here.
headerFooter.previewHint: Enter header or footer text to see preview

invertColors.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.

backgroundColor.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.

textColor.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.
textColor.thresholdHint: Adjust to control which pixels are affected

stamps.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here.
stamps.instruction1: Click the Stamp tool (image icon) in the toolbar above
stamps.instruction2: Click "Add image" to upload your stamp image
stamps.instruction3: Click on the PDF where you want to place the stamp
stamps.instruction4: Drag to resize or reposition the stamp
stamps.instruction5: Click "Save Stamped PDF" below when done
stamps.viewerNotReady: Viewer not ready. Please wait for the PDF to load.
stamps.saveFailed: Failed to save stamped PDF. Please try again.

removeAnnotations.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.

formFiller.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF form.

formCreator.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here.
formCreator.selectHint: Click a field to select, drag to move, use corner to resize
formCreator.addFieldHint: Click on the PDF to add a {type} field
formCreator.noFieldSelected: Select a field to edit its properties, or use the toolbar to add new fields.
formCreator.noFieldsYet: No fields added yet. Click on the PDF to add form fields.
formCreator.flattenFormHint: Make form fields non-editable (converts to static content)
formCreator.saveNote: Projects are saved locally in your browser.
formCreator.shortcutsHint: Shortcuts: Ctrl+Z (Undo) | Ctrl+Y (Redo) | Ctrl+D (Duplicate) | Ctrl+A (Select All) | Delete (Remove)
formCreator.clickToAdd: Click on PDF to add field
formCreator.blankPdfNote: A blank PDF will be created for you to add form fields.
formCreator.templateHint: Or choose a template to get started quickly

removeBlankPages.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.

tableOfContents.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.
tableOfContents.bookmarkRequired: This tool generates a clickable table of contents from existing PDF bookmarks. Please ensure your PDF has bookmarks before using this tool. You can add bookmarks using the Edit Bookmarks tool.

markdownToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a .md or .markdown file to convert to PDF.
markdownToPdf.gfmLabel: Enable GitHub Flavored Markdown (tables, task lists, etc.)
markdownToPdf.syntaxHighlightLabel: Enable syntax highlighting for code blocks
markdownToPdf.successMessage: PDF created successfully! Click download to save.

pdfToDocx.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to browse.
pdfToDocx.successMessage: Your PDF has been successfully converted to DOCX! Click the download button to save your file.

pdfToMarkdown.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to browse.
pdfToMarkdown.successMessage: Your PDF has been successfully converted to Markdown! Click the download button to save your file.
pdfToMarkdown.failed: Failed to convert PDF to Markdown.

pdfToExcel.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to browse.
pdfToExcel.extractNote: Each page's tables will be extracted to separate sheets in the Excel file.
pdfToExcel.successMessage: Your PDF tables have been extracted to Excel.

pdfToPptx.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to browse.
pdfToPptx.dpiHint: Higher DPI produces better quality slides but larger file sizes.
pdfToPptx.successMessage: Your PDF has been converted to PowerPoint. Each page is now a slide with full-quality images.

wordToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a Word document (.docx) here, or click to browse.
wordToPdf.successMessage: Your Word document has been successfully converted to PDF!

psdToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PSD (Photoshop) file here, or click to browse.
psdToPdf.successMessage: PSD converted to PDF successfully! Click the download button to save your file.

excelToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop an Excel file (.xlsx) here, or click to browse.
excelToPdf.successMessage: Your Excel file has been successfully converted to PDF!

pptxToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PowerPoint file (.pptx) here, or click to browse.
pptxToPdf.successMessage: Your PowerPoint file has been successfully converted to PDF!

xpsToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop an XPS file here, or click to browse.
xpsToPdf.successMessage: Your XPS file has been successfully converted to PDF!

rtfToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop an RTF file here, or click to browse.
rtfToPdf.successMessage: Your RTF file has been successfully converted to PDF!

epubToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop an EPUB e-book file here, or click to browse.
epubToPdf.successMessage: Your EPUB file has been successfully converted to PDF!

mobiToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a MOBI/AZW e-book file here, or click to browse.
mobiToPdf.successMessage: Your MOBI file has been successfully converted to PDF!

fb2ToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop FB2 e-book files here, or click to browse. Supports multiple files.
fb2ToPdf.successMessage: Your FB2 file(s) have been successfully converted to PDF!

djvuToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a DJVU file here, or click to browse.
djvuToPdf.dpiHint: Higher DPI = larger file size, better quality
djvuToPdf.successMessage: Your DJVU file has been successfully converted to PDF!

deskewPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop PDF files here. You can process up to 10 files at once.
deskewPdf.thresholdDesc: Higher values detect more subtle skew angles. Default: 10
deskewPdf.dpiDesc: Higher DPI provides more accurate detection but takes longer.

pdfBooklet.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file to create a booklet layout.
pdfBooklet.gridModeDesc: 1x2 is standard for booklets. Use larger grids to save paper.
pdfBooklet.previewDesc: This preview shows how pages will be arranged on each sheet.
pdfBooklet.successMessage: Booklet created successfully! Click download to save.

rasterizePdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file to rasterize into images or a new PDF.
rasterizePdf.pageRangeDesc: Leave empty to convert all pages.
rasterizePdf.successMessage: Rasterization complete! Click download to save your file.

emailToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop an email file (.eml) to convert to PDF.

cbzToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a comic book archive (.cbz) to convert to PDF.

pdfToPdfa.uploadDescription: Drag and drop PDF files to convert to PDF/A format.

fontToOutline.uploadDescription: Drag and drop PDF files to convert fonts to outlines.

extractTables.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file to extract tables from.
extractTables.successMessage: Tables extracted successfully! Click download to save.

ocgManager.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF to manage its layers (OCG).

pdfReader.uploadDescription: Open a PDF file to read and view.

findAndRedact.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file to search and redact text.
findAndRedact.searchTermPlaceholder: Enter text to search (e.g., account number, name)...
findAndRedact.searchInputPlaceholder: Enter search terms, separated by commas...
findAndRedact.searchInputHelp: Tip: Separate multiple terms with commas (,)
findAndRedact.multipleTermsPlaceholder:
Enter search terms (one per line or comma-separated)...
Example:
John Doe
account123
555-1234
findAndRedact.enterSearchTerm: Please enter at least one search term.
findAndRedact.noMatchesFound: No matches found for the search terms.
findAndRedact.selectMatchesToRedact: Please select at least one match to redact.
findAndRedact.warningText: Redaction is permanent. Once applied, the original content cannot be recovered.
findAndRedact.successMessage: Successfully redacted the selected text! Click download to save.
